website_summaries.verdict: This versatile hardware will match a variety of design themes. Its solid metal construction brings sturdiness and heft to an upgrade project.
pros: Matches contemporary, transitional, and rustic themes
Solid metal construction is comparable to high-end pulls
cons: Included screws are too short for some projects
Some concerns about actual hole width

customer_reviews.title: Hand Feel Is Great - Weight Is Great - Look Is Great
customer_reviews.text: Weight and hand fell are both excellent. If you are looking for a high end looking modern handle this is it. If you are particular you will notice that the finish has lots of small inconsistencies. I am very particular and once installed I haven't even noticed the imperfections since. Hopefully these last a long time. They are heavy and have a nice high quality feeling. They look great. I would buy again and am happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: BH

customer_reviews.title: Not frustration free..
customer_reviews.text: I’m really letting franklin brass have it for not including the longer screws. I’m having to make a trip to HD anyway after trying to avoid that. NOBODY has drawers that take 1” screws. The item description said “frustration free.” Nope.. also, these handles have the yellowy hue to them, so it won’t match your stainless stuff exactly. I wish these manufacturers would get together and decide what brushed nickel is supposed to look like. They were banged up a little. Just careless handling by the manufacturer I guess. Just small dings, but if you’re anal like me, you want them perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Common Sense

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Really loved these handles, great price for the quality. We ordered the 3 and 4 inch in the heirloom silver to outfit the drawers in our new home, both kitchen and bathrooms (combined with the square knobs). Good heavy pull with a nice feel. I was a bit worried about catching pockets and such on the handles in the kitchen but so far that hasn't been an issue. One thing I really like is the color of the heirloom silver, works great with the dark highlights in our cabinets but still has a more modern/transitional feel.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Great looking handles!
customer_reviews.text: My Kitchen is very old and in need of some renovations. When it came to the cheap ugly looking door handles to be replaced that the contractors used I went to Lowes and then Home Depot and on... I am on a budget and did not want to spend more than 3 dollars a piece but still wanted something that you look good. I came to Amazon and found these and decided to take the risk and I am glad I did! These handles look the best in my kitchen and they feel solid. I got the Warm Chestnut ones.
customer_reviews.author: MannyMI

customer_reviews.title: Very Attractive, Quality, Value Product!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 5 packs of these for our new home and love them! Quality out-of-the box is outstanding. Did not have any with cosmetic defects as reported by others. Great Price, better than anything we could find at the big-box!
customer_reviews.author: Michael S

customer_reviews.title: Quality drawer pulls at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and quality drawer pulls. Bought them for a new rental property we purchased, and installed them in the kitchen and master bath. They go well with the stainless steel appliances. I love the slightly curved shape. Great price too compared to hardware found in big box stores. My handyman installed them, and they look amazing. He did have to buy longer screws for the drawers, as other reviewers have stated. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: PhxVegas

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: They look even better than in the pictures, great kitchen cabinet hardware. Very sturdy and heavy construction. They look perfect. We haven't finished installing the rest of them yet, but so far we like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Not As Wide as Advertised, Many Scratched Ones
customer_reviews.text: These are not 12mm wide, they are actually less than 11mm. I kind of expected a modern look with a wider and bigger appearance, but they are kind of classic specially from the distance where you don’t see the curve. If they would’ve been at least half an inch wide, they would have been more modern and contemporary. The finish is a coated finish, so it’s smooth like finger resistant stainless. From the 50 I ordered, more than half were scratched or bruised because the way they packaged them, so maybe order more and return the scratched ones. Good luck and thanks for reading.
customer_reviews.author: Simon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely beautiful handles. I bought them to finish off my kitchen and I couldn't be happier with the end result.
customer_reviews.author: Online Shopping Rocks!

customer_reviews.title: Just a beautiful pull
customer_reviews.text: These are gorgeous! They are solid and a heavier weight (3.6 oz) and just beautiful. They come with 1 inch 8/32 screws which would probably work for cabinet doors but I am using them for drawers which are 1" deep thru the face and drawer. Off to my local hardware, where I purchased 8/32 1 1/4 inch screws which work perfectly. I paid $6.50 for a box of 100 which was MUCH cheaper than buying per piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Great! Great! Great!
customer_reviews.text: These were definitely worth the purchase. We almost spent 4times the amount at Home Depot/Lowe’s for the same ones! I cannot believe we found these for such a good deal and the quality is great. Make sure you order the correct size is the only tip I have. We have larger cabinets so we ordered the 4inch ones instead of the 3 inch and they look fantastic in our new kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Rolinda Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Beyond Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: We had been searching for slightly darker silver hardware to go with our “slate” kitchen cabinets. After finding this Heirloom Silver color we knew we had found the perfect match! These go perfectly with our GE “Slate” appliances as well. I love the matte finish and this size was perfect for our kitchen. We couldn’t be happier and they were very easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Crafty Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the drawers in my kitchen and, for the price was quite impressed by the quality. The screws that came with the handles weren’t long enough to go through the drawer and drawer front, so I had to purchase longer screws. Once I had the right length screws, they were easy to install and they look great. I love they way they look and am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Great & very clean looking!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the first set so much I bought a second set in a different shade for our second bathroom. They are very clean and nice - in addition to being sturdy. Also - seems to hide kids fingerprints pretty well too!
customer_reviews.author: Christy M

customer_reviews.title: Used these on our new white cabinets and love them. Got the shorter ones for the drawers ...
customer_reviews.text: Used these on our new white cabinets and love them. Got the shorter ones for the drawers and longer for the cabinet doors. The long handles efinitely looks better on the tall cabinets than a simple knob.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: pulls
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty, nice weight. Purchased 40 pulls and as I opened each bag, had to sort into different grades. The perfect ones I put up high, there were blems or tiny gouges on about half of them. So I put into 3 piles, perfect, grade one and grade two. The lesser perfect will go down low where they will be less noticed. Only one length of screw so had to buy longer screws for the drawer fronts. I made a template to use for placement as desired. If I had to do over I would have bought something else. You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Olliemomdad

customer_reviews.title: This is the match for stainless appliances
customer_reviews.text: Quality, heavy, nice design. I had this and the heirloom silver. This is the one to match stainless appliances. The heirloom silver is more gray like pencil lead. The satin nickel is very bright and shiny. I had pics uploaded of both of them together but they don't appear for some reason. I paired this and stainless steel appliances with some copper accents in the kitchen and it turned out great.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Campbell

customer_reviews.title: stainless handles 3" centers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to help finish a minor bathroom remodel. They are slight curved so the edges tend not to hook clothing - which is good. Smooth and a satin finish. I really like them. They are what I would consider a medium weight - not super heavy but not lightweight either. Look like more than I paid for them in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: ForeverYOUNGTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful handles - look great with black stainless appliances
customer_reviews.text: We just remodeled our kitchen and after MANY purchases and returns we decided on these handles for our cabinets. They are a very nice quality and look beautiful on our white cabinets. Even better, which was not planned, they are almost identical to the color of the handles on our black stainless appliances. The only thing I do want to share is that the screws that they come with are not long enough to use for drawers so if you plan on attaching these to drawers you will need to buy new screws.
customer_reviews.author: Abby A.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and looks great
customer_reviews.text: High quality solid pull. The nice thing about the product is it is available in different lengths depending on the size of the drawer or cabinet. I found the 5" worked well on the tall cabinets and the long drawers, while the 3" looked better on the lower cabinets and smaller drawers. The only drawback was the 1" screws didn't work on the drawers - had to get longer screws, 1 3/4" in my case and also bought #8 washers. In the end they look great particularly on the white cabinetry; the heirloom silver has a rich look.
customer_reviews.author: JL III

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: The 3 inch were perfect for my kitchen. I thought they’d be too small, but they were just right! I got the heirloom silver, which were a tad darker than my stainless steel appliances (which is what I wanted). They match my backsplash perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Kale

customer_reviews.title: Might need new screws if drawers are thick
customer_reviews.text: Updated my kitchen with these, so beautiful. Looks at tons at menards and home depot. Wasnt nearly as impressed. Feels good in the hand, looks great too. Simple to install. Make sure you measure your cabinets ahead of time. Also be prepared to get longer screws possibly if your drawers are thicker than the cabinets as mine were. Easy to do by bringing the old and the new to home depot and thread/length matching
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Weber

customer_reviews.title: I was sent the wrong pulls due to mislabeling issues.
customer_reviews.text: We were sent 5 boxes of 5 inch pulls; model #P29618K-904-B. We ordered 5 boxes of 4 inch pulls model #P29615k-904-B. They are completely different designs (and sizes!) Interestingly, the correct labels for the product was covered over with the labels of the model we ordered on all 5 boxes of pulls. So, all 50 pulls we received were incorrectly labeled both for size and model. I have concerns that due to all of the boxes having this problem that it will be fruitless to order again. I would appreciate someone checking my next order to ensure that the order is correct.
customer_reviews.author: Katie J.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying these because I thought they would be a cheap hollow pull, but I really loved the look so I went for it. I was blown away with how heavy duty they are. They match perfectly with the asthetics of our kitchen and we're super easy to install. They stick just far enough off the cabinet so you can slide your fingers in them. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Christina from Florida

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive looking in person.
customer_reviews.text: It's really hard to look at cabinet hardware online and imagine what it will look like on the cabinets. These handles are very heavy and look fantastic! Even my hard to impress husband likes them. I can see them lasting for years and years to come and I am so glad I picked these, every cabinet in house looks high-end now.
customer_reviews.author: Kate from STL

customer_reviews.title: These are very nice and look very expensive
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice and look very expensive. We were doing a remodel, so someone else put them on. Just know, that you may possibly have to get new screws depending on the type of cabinets you are putting them on. We had shaker cabinets, so the screws were not long enough; but for the price picking up some longer screws were no problem. It would be nice, if they included a couple of sizes, but I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: mgatc

customer_reviews.title: Really nice handles!
customer_reviews.text: After doing a lot of shopping in the big box stores and checking on Amazon, I took a chance on these handles for my kitchen renovation and I'm so glad I did! The quality and finish is great and they feel comfortable in your hand when opening the drawer. Like others have said, the screws that came with them were too short to use with my drawers but it was easy enough and cheap to get the right length at the hardware store. If I had any more renovations left to do (thank God I don't!), I wouldn't hesitate to buy these again. Very competitive price for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie E.

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Silver Nickel Pulls
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cabinet pulls. Well made and sturdy. I live the silver nickel. The pulls were packaged individually. They added a touch of elegance to my kitchen. The color and design was very similar to my stainless steel appliances. I was able to use the long screws from my old pulls. Note, the box contains short screws, not long screws. Lowes sells Franklin Brass cabinet pulls, but they were a little cheaper on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lvdecor

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, high quality knobs and pulls
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, high quality knobs and pulls. Unfortunately, they were too large, 5 inch pulls, and knobs didn't look right. Instead I ordered the 3 inch. These were a wonderful set. But I am annoyed that amazon is charging me for returning the unwanted items. Thought that's why I pay for Prime, no shipping and free returns. First time ever for me. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: KLEPK

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality and Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: We paired these with the square Franklin Brass P29542K-SN-B Parow Kitchen Cabinet Hardware Knob and they look great together. We have used these in our rental houses to update the hardware on both the kitchen and bathroom cabinets. They're sturdy, decent quality, easy to install, and have a nice finish. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Hardware
customer_reviews.text: This hardware is absolutely beautiful . It will work with a modern or a classic kitchen. The weight is substantial. And at one third the cost of HD Pricing. It's an amazing value
customer_reviews.author: Maryaurelia

customer_reviews.title: Great to glam up your kitchen
customer_reviews.text: great price for a pack, sturdy, no scratches, easy to install. I would recommend getting a template and longer bolts depending on the thick of the drawer or cabinet (depending on how they are made).
customer_reviews.author: Mikey Morales

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these along with 3 other handles of the same brand for our kitchen and bathroom cabinets. I thought these would be my least favorite, but we returned the other 3 and kept these! The warm chestnut is dark and rich and the design is very versatile. It works for our rustic/country home, but could certainly be used in a contemporary home as well. Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: EmNY

customer_reviews.title: Nice curves
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t install these myself so I cannot speak to the ease or difficulty of that. I really like how this option turned out. I picked two sets of hardware and this model/style won first choice. They are substantial in weight and just a more updated feel than knobs. It is roomy enough to fit your (my) hand behind. The curvature is a nice twist to all of the hard angles on the cabinetry. The finish is a soft satin nickel and accompanies the SS in the kitchen very nicely. I am so pleased with the product and love the finished look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great handles! Screws too short for drawers!
customer_reviews.text: These are an awesome color. Super subtle, simple and cost effective. I really do love them. After months without knobs and handles we now have them! I don't have any cons yet, let's see if the color stays consistent and doesn't scratch off. Easy to install, the only down fall for install was the screws are rather short if you are using these for drawers. Thankfully I had the old screws from the handles before these ones.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla

customer_reviews.title: very nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly. It's a big drawer; full of utensils and the single knob kept coming off due to the weight so I bought this one. Can't beat the price for the quality. Nice heavy duty brass, plated with brushed nickel. Comes with the screws required. Took all of 3 minutes to install.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Andresen

customer_reviews.title: Good quailty but horrible screws provided
customer_reviews.text: The pull handles are nice and match perfect with my cherry wood cabinets but the provided screws are cheap and too short. I had to end up buying screws and washers from Lowe's for both my 3 inch and 5 inch handles. I attempted to install them myself but will be getting a Professional after 2 runs of trying to get the exact screws. Keep you posted with an updated review.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Ignore the bad reviews - these are 4-inches and have screws
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the negative reviews cautiously only ordered 1 bag of these to replace my 4-inch gold loop handles. I needn't have worried, they are exactly 4-inches screw center to center and included a bag of screws (although i didn't need them since the old screws fitted). They look a million times better than the ones I am replacing, a nice weight to them, great finish and classy look. They match very well with stainless kitchen appliances. I have just ordered another 5 bags of 10 to finish the job. I also ordered a bag of the chestnut ones for my utility room which also look great.
customer_reviews.author: Corsaro

customer_reviews.title: Great Cabinet Hardware
customer_reviews.text: Love these handles. The color is great (not too bronze) and the quality is really good. They are very sturdy and not cheaply made at all. I originally ordered a smaller size, but returned them for the 4 inch, which look much better since we have taller cabinets. You will need to purchase longer screws if you have drawers, but that was an easy fix. Would highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Better than could have hoped!! solid and heavy duty, looks and feels high-end.
customer_reviews.text: Better than could have hoped!! solid and heavy duty, looks and feels high-end.... Better than I could have hoped. Ordered an combo of 4" (order 3") and 6" handles (order 5") and the square knobs plus the measurement tools, and I am SUPER happy with the quality and how much I saved.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Easy to install. Nice finishes, all high quality. Looks more expensive than it is. Holding up to daily kitchen use for 6+ months now without scratches, blemishes, or other signs of wear.
customer_reviews.author: WPB

customer_reviews.title: Take Note of Your Drawers!
customer_reviews.text: These pulls are lovely; however, the screws that are included ONLY fit a cabinet facing; they do NOT fit a cabinet facing AND a drawer insert! The screws are about 1/2" too short. I, consequently, have to go and buy longer screws because I have a cabinet facing AND a drawer insert! I was all excited to get them installed with my cabinet knobs -- which only have to adhere to a cabinet facing -- but, alas, can't install because the screws are just not long enough for the drawer pulls.
customer_reviews.author: gclem

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the $$$
customer_reviews.text: I love these handles! I bought the handle pulls & knobs (think of mix matching) but opted for just the handles once arrived. Esthetically these are beautiful, and a good heavy handle. The only thing (and thank god I took my time) the holes on the template are not centered. I had my roommate double check and thank goodness he noticed, He re-drilled the template for what our needs were, and BAM!! Awesome kitchen!! Could not be happier!! I will be returning the knobs as I have no need for them.
customer_reviews.author: NatNat Jones

customer_reviews.title: Classy heavy quality handles
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy quality, beautuful. Bought this style to match refergerator handle. Also bought square/round knobs, both brushed stainless. Love then, haven't mounted them yet. Redoing all kitchen cabinets incl hinges. Bought house built in 88, icky hardware, replacing all and painting all cabinets white.
customer_reviews.author: SHARON

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality handles
customer_reviews.text: Went round and round trying to find the right handles. Many were cheap and too small for cabinets. Suprised when these arrived how stury they were and heavy duty. Finnish is nice and overall they look great in my kitchen. Glad I kept trying and found these. 4 inch is accurate and just the right size for all fingers to fit through. Others I tried are sized in mm and difficult to work with mounting templates. Great value and quality!
customer_reviews.author: Dog gone

customer_reviews.title: Nice look
customer_reviews.text: Looks gorgeous, updated our kitchen to a modern contemporary style. Would have given a five but a few of the screw holes were a tiny bit off do I had a hard time aligning them.
customer_reviews.author: tiatia

customer_reviews.title: These pulls are amazing especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: These pulls are amazing especially for the price. Comparative quality is at least 2x's the price. They are sturdy and substantial and the subtle curve gives you a modern clean look with out going all out Euro. I debated back and forth between the 5" and the 4" and ended up going with the latter on all of my drawers. That ended up being a good choice for consistency and the handles are plenty big enough. I SOO happy with this product and would order Franklin Brass again in a heartbeat. I went with the Warm Chestnut in our kitchen and the Satin Nickel in the bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: CatNoelle

customer_reviews.title: They look beautiful! The pull is heavy and solid
customer_reviews.text: We just moved into our newly built home and I ordered this handle to install on my kitchen and bathroom cabinets and drawers. They look beautiful! The pull is heavy and solid. I'm very pleased withy my purchase. Shipping was quick and the order actually arrived sooner than I anticipated. You won't be disappointed with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Luvtoshop

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: I really like how these look on our white fireplace room cabinets. The bronze ties in nicely with the overhead light which is also bronze, and the black in the fireplace, TV, speakers, and drapery rods. I wanted handles that were big—but not too big. These are just right for the look we wanted. I already had a template guide for drilling holes (from a previous cabinet project) which I used to install these handles. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to upgrade our cabinet handles and these did the trick. They came in 1 day and each is individually wrapped in plastic and in perfect condition. Waiting for matching knobs to complete the job. What a big difference little handles make.
customer_reviews.author: D. S.

customer_reviews.title: Look sharp, high quality
customer_reviews.text: These all came individually wrapped. Handles are good quality, look clean and sharp. I haven’t seen any defects, scratches or imperfections on a single handle. Look great when mounted. Very pleased with this product. I highly recommend would order from again.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W

customer_reviews.title: Rich looking at a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking cabinet handles,at a fair price,bought eight boxes,no defects,sturdy and heavy,may need longer screws for pullout drawers 1 3/4 is what worked for me,highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mongo

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I am loving these. They are very heavy duty, functional and beautiful. I chose the antique heirloom finish because I have stainless steel appliances and some oil rubbed bronze light fixtures and i have dark cabinets so I didn’t want the cabinet handles to look too bright( if that makes any sense). These are the perfect balance.
customer_reviews.author: MelissaLoverOfBooks

customer_reviews.title: MIsleading description
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this product, the description said 25 pieces. I really needed 35 so I ordered 2 packs. But when it was delivered, I received two 10 packs. So now I'm short 15 pieces and will need to order two more packs.
customer_reviews.author: Betty P

customer_reviews.title: These are a metal painted finish that starts to peel ...
customer_reviews.text: These are a metal painted finish that starts to peel off in just a few months making our newly remodeled kitchen look cheap
customer_reviews.author: Kele S.

customer_reviews.title: Great selection of cabinet accessories
customer_reviews.text: I love the selection of cabinet accessories through Amazon. They always arrive quick. I bought these for our kitchen and definitely add a nice touch. I love the color cus it has just a a little touch of gold in them.
customer_reviews.author: Kecia Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Well Made
customer_reviews.text: These cabinet pulls are stylishly contemporary and substantially constructed. The edges are not sharp and the inward curve seems to resist catching ones clothing on the handles as I had hoped. The finish was perfect and they arrived well packaged without scratches.
customer_reviews.author: Sandstone

customer_reviews.title: Hefty and good looking cabinet pulls!
customer_reviews.text: These cabinet pulls are solid and they look really nice on my kitchen cabinets. I cannot attest to the longevity of the product, but visually they are very good looking cabinets. I used the Kreg cabinet jig to install them. It was super helpful and made installation of all the pulls in a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: I'd leave zero stars if I could.
customer_reviews.text: Just about every screw broke while installing. One broke causing the handle to slip and scrap my drawer. I'm really mad! I could one doing this but it was like 6 n one handle had the hold crooked. Couldnt even use it. I'm mad.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey L.

customer_reviews.title: Love the handles matches great with my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: Love the handles matches great with my kitchen. However I would suggest sending two different lengths screws with the handles. There is a difference in length needed when using the handles for drawers or cabinets.
customer_reviews.author: Tia t.

customer_reviews.title: Great price, excellent product would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: I am super pleased with my purchase. What a tremendous value and high quality, you would pay considerably more for these drawer pulls at a hardware or specialty store. The weight and feel is fantastic. Would buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara S. Tamblyn

customer_reviews.title: Curved look, short length screws
customer_reviews.text: These handles stick out in a curved fashion from the drawer front - bit of a half moon shape. It is NOT a flat, parallel handle. Finish is a nice brushed nickel. Comes with two short mounting screws, which can be an issue if you have a drawer front mounted onto a base drawer (double front).
customer_reviews.author: K. Henning

customer_reviews.title: Good Handles, Bad Screws
customer_reviews.text: The handles are great quality. The screws that come with the handles are awful... The screws are really cheap and strip very easily. I quickly realized after spending too much time trying to install that you have to buy screws. Frustrating. But the quality of the handles is probably worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Dolloff

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Deceiving headline
customer_reviews.text: I placed this order thinking this came with 25 pulls. It comes with 10 pulls and 25 screws. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They look and feel great, excellent value
customer_reviews.text: These are just as good as any you could find at Lowe’s or Home Depot, for a fraction of the cost. They are sleek, a nice solid heaviness to them, perfect classy look that’s not too modern, but not an outdated style.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: sleek and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Just installed these on white shaker style cabinets during a renovation - actually used for top and base cabinets for a really clean look. They feel substantial, not like some drawer pulls that feel lightweight and cheap. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Linda P

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these handles for my kitchen. Good quality and I love the way they look. I had to purchase longer screws in order to install them on my drawers, but once I had the right length screws, they were easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful.  Matches black stainless appliances
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful! They match our black stainless steel appliances perfectly and help create a custom look in our kitchen. I priced something similar at home depot and they were over $6/each.
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These are a heavy-weight handle that looks classic and finishes off our newly remodeled kitchen in style. A great price for the quality of these handles when compared to the big box stores!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine D

customer_reviews.title: Great handles for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these handles for my kitchen cabinets and love them! They are quite heavy and durable for the price. Seriously like 4x cheaper than any stores we looked at. I was a little weary of buying them online, but I have been very happy with them. Durable, heavy, easy to clean, and no scratches thus far. I have only had them for about 3 months, but my parents have the same ones and are loving them 3+ years later.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ahrendt

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 70 of these for all of my cabinets and closet doors in a new construction. They look beautiful, quality made. Easy to install, holes lined up correctly, unlike some cheap ones that don’t. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Quality handles
customer_reviews.text: Nice hardware for refinishing my bathroom vanity. Handles are heavy/quality and the finish is pretty good. Similar hardware is much more expensive at the big box stores.
customer_reviews.author: GnshpCSO

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: These are very sturdy handles. Great price for the quality. Updating a traditional cherry bedroom set that has brass pulls. I have silver thought the room so these r perfect.
customer_reviews.author: mannefitz

customer_reviews.title: Gave my furniture a whole new look!
customer_reviews.text: I just couldn't get rid of my expensive old furniture, but I did not like the old style gold drawer pulls. It wasn't easy to find something that looked good with oak, but I was quite pleased with this!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are just as good if not better than the way more expensive ones. They look great and we’re easy to install on my cabinets and doors.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Twice as nice, buy them!
customer_reviews.text: Vanity handles were twice as nice. Handles that came with $1200 /60” vanity were cheap and two toned. These handles are super nice and great shape. Buy them!
customer_reviews.author: burr1710

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Kitchen remodels are expensive, time consuming, and frustrating! Choosing cabinet pulls was not easy but I was so pleased with the weight, look, and ease of install.
customer_reviews.author: Ammy

customer_reviews.title: New pulls
customer_reviews.text: These new pulls replace some old shiny brass ones. They are economically priced considering how heavy they are. Very pleased with this purchase. They came before projected.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn S

customer_reviews.title: Quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these cabinet drawer pulls for a kitchen make-over. I had shopped at the local hardware stores and found something similar, but not of this quality...or price. The delivery was actually a day ahead of schedule. These are very well made and sturdy. They look beautiful on my cherry cabinets. I was able to install them easily by myself. I would highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: GC

customer_reviews.title: Handsome and high quality (but short screws for a drawer pull!)
customer_reviews.text: Really handsome warm deep brown color that blends well with our chocolate brown cabinets so that the pulls don’t draw attention. These ship with DOOR length screws, though, which was a little disappointing. I had to go out to the hardware store for #8-32x1.5” screws to install on drawers.
customer_reviews.author: LanceD

customer_reviews.title: Nice Handles
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace thirty year old pulls. I was not disapointed. They added a real updated look to my old cabinets. The weight of the handles is very nice. Nice product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: L. A. Mangum

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value but screws arent long enough to go through my oak vanity drawers so I'll have to buy more hardware. The ha does are beautiful though and I cant wait to see them installed.
customer_reviews.author: CaraBou

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Used these on a house flip they looked and worked great. Would have cost more if I'd got some like these at Lowes. Alot of compliments from viewers
customer_reviews.author: Jace Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Add class to any drawers or cabinets with this well-made produce that’s easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to update our master bath and this was an easy first step. The drawer handles and pulls were very easy to install and they look great. A little expensive but you won’t find a better price for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lady lawyer

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these. I bought these to go on a ...
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. I bought these to go on a custom cherry 6' double vanity and I bought the 4" thinking they would easier to operate with more room to grab but I was worried they would be too large. They weren't overly large at all and really made the cabinet look nice. The finish isn't as rustic as I thought it might be but they still look amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Hooligan Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and finish!
customer_reviews.text: The fit and finish off these handled were superb. They are surprisingly heavy in a good way. I'm glad I spent the few extra dollars for this 10 pack compared to some of the cheaper offerings.
customer_reviews.author: Josh L

customer_reviews.title: Perfect  Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Look and feel great. Nice large size has a high end finish and appearance. Only down size is the price for 10 is fantastic, price for one is a little high. I needed 21 handles, but the look was worth the price I paid for that last handle.
customer_reviews.author: Rivka

customer_reviews.title: These have modernized my bedroom dressers to this century.
customer_reviews.text: My bedroom dressers and nightstands were looking so old, we were thinking about buying new furniture. However, after putting these handles on, we are keeping our bedroom furniture. These handles have really made a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: The gave a whole new life to my old bathroom cabinets. They look really good and can’t tell the difference from more expensive hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Glory

customer_reviews.title: These handles are fantastic
customer_reviews.text: The color was gorgeous as well as the texture. These handles were excellent quality the screws fit perfectly and are very sturdy. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Quality Pulls
customer_reviews.text: Wow. My old cabinet hardware from 1966 was ugly and worn. The new ones really “dress up” my kitchen! I feel like I got my money’s worth because they are heavy compared to the old ones and were super easy to install too. Of course having an electric screwdriver helps!
customer_reviews.author: GLB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: We were very pleased with this product. It had good weight and the screws holes were drilled properly , so we did not have any problems when we went to install them. I highly recommend them
customer_reviews.author: CHOCOLATEDOG

customer_reviews.title: Quality surpasses similar pulls
customer_reviews.text: After a kitchen renovation it took me quite a while to decide on hardware for the cabinets. I ended up ordering roughly 12 different bar style pulls from Amazon to compare them in hand. I chose these as the quality was unmatched. The finish and weight was more consistant throughout than its competitors. Had no issues with the threading of screws, did buy 1 1/2" screws for the drawers. The top of my cabinets have a slight curve as do my appliances so these tied in very well. Will be ordering from Franklin Bass for my next project.
customer_reviews.author: JeAnna

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Perfect Size!
customer_reviews.text: These handles are the perfect size for kitchen cabinets. Any smaller and someone with large hands would probably be irritated. I felt like pricing was very fair. They look great on my moms re-faced cabinets!
customer_reviews.author: Diana M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful handles
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy handles. Great width. Should come with longer screws to use on draws. One inch screws were too short. Had to buy longer screws.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality
customer_reviews.text: We just re-did our kitchen and used these pulls on hickory wood cabinets and they look fantastic. Super high quality. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa S.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at the quality of these drawer pulls for my new hobby center cabinets. Love the brushed nickel look of them. They are solid substantial drawer pulls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I put these handles on my bathroom cabinets. Very easy to put on with the Rok cabinet Hardward Door and Drawer Drilling Template. It came with the drill bit. The handles are very sturdy and they were a good price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: A great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Painted my kitchen cabinets a light gray and these were the perfect compliment to them. They are sturdy and feel smooth when you grab them and were also much cheaper than at Home Depot or Lowe’s. I did buy the template for installation since our cabinets didn’t have any previous hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Jones

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Love these!! Fit perfect sturdy and look amazing! Bought to replace the ill fitting loose ones that wiggles all over and came loose because they didn't properly fit the predrilled holes in the cabinents that came with our home rental.
customer_reviews.author: Shops too much

product_meta.title: Franklin Brass P29615K-SN-B Pierce Kitchen or Furniture Cabinet Hardware Drawer Handle Pull, 4 inch, Satin Nickel, 10 Pack
product_meta.description:
Number of Items:10| Color:Satin Nickel| Size:4 InchThe Pierce Pull features a transitional style that complements a variety of kitchen decor. Perfect for modern, transitional or casual cabinetry and furniture, it is crafted from die cast zinc for long lasting quality and durability. Installation hardware is included.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Pierce Pull features a transitional style that complements a variety of kitchen decor. Perfect for modern, transitional or casual cabinetry and furniture, it is crafted from die cast zinc for long lasting quality and durability. Installation hardware is included.
feature_bullets: Updating cabinet hardware can be an easy and quick way to add your personal touch to change the look and feel of an entire room. Make cabinet hardware a part of your home décor today
Satin nickel finish is a classic compliment to brushed nickel appliances and decorative accents
10 pack cabinet pulls to help complete that larger projects
For easy installation use Alignright Template AN0251C CL U (sold separately)
4 inch is the center to center measurement
